rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with Scandinavian design elements and natural light from large windows.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom incorporating Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room designed with Scandinavian minimalism and efficient use of space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with open layout and ample storage, following Vastu guidelines for functional energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom designed with Scandinavian simplicity and adequate ventilation.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard featuring a water element and greenery for enhanced natural ventilation and privacy. It connects the living spaces ensuring seamless indoor-outdoor transition.

garage.description: Two-car garage integrated with the bungalow design to maintain aesthetic continuity while providing functional parking space.

pool.description: Designed with Scandinavian aesthetics and ample safety features, the pool enhances relaxation and outdoor living space.
